item.description:
Per Ms. Wells the Outreach Coordinator or the W. Hartford REI store, those wishing to volunteer are to give Ms. Wells a telephone number and email address so that she can can communicate one last time to everyone directions and a reminder of appropriate clothing and footwear.

If you contact Ms. Wells directly, please state that you are with The Greater Hartford Adventurers Meetup Group (this event is cross-listed with Hartford Area Hiking). Ms. Wells' telephone and email address are below.

Event listing with REI:
http://www.rei.com/st...

We will clean the ravine near Windsor Avenue/Main Street entrance and improve a trail by opening a former roadway for bicycle and pedestrian use.

Participants will receive REI Volunteer tee-shirt, coffee, water, and a snack will be provided. Meet 10:00 am at the golf course in Keney parking lot. (REI's website, http://www.rei.com/st... ). Rain or shine. Please pre-register with Outreach Specialist Jenna Wells,
jewells@rei.com, 860-233-2211, x 203.


Directions to Service Project at Keney Park, Windsor Ave/Main Street Entrance to Park:

From the North:
* Take 91 South to Exit 34.
* Take 159 Exit and Turn Left on Main Street.
* Cross Under highway Park Entrance on your left.
* Enter Keney Park follow park road until T intersection Take a right
* Follow road until you find the golf course parking.

From the South:
* Take I95 North to Exit 34.
* Take 159 Exit.
* Take a left at the end of the exit and then an immediate right onto Main Street.
* Keney Park entrance will be immediately on your left.
* Enter Keney Park follow park road until T intersection.
* Take a right follow road until you find the golf course parking.

Location: Keney Park, Hartford, CT
Contact: Jenna Wells Outreach Specialist
Cost: Free
Registration Required. Please pre-register by calling 860-233-2211 x 203.

Keney Park Home Page:
http://www.keneyparkh...

REI Store, West Hartford, Local information page:
http://www.rei.com/st...
item.how_to_find_us: Sven Pihl (http://adventurers.meetup.com/167/members/2672127/ ) is the leader on this one! He is leading via his Meetup: Greater Hartford Adventurers (http://adventurers.meetup.com/167/ )
item.why: Volunteering for Trail Days is a noble cause.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Service Event: CT Trails Day (Keney Park, Trail Improvement/Cleanup - Hartford)
